name: @gratcy/angka-terbilang-indonesia
description: Angka Terbilang in NodeJS for Converting Decimal to an Indonesian Wording format

scripts.minified: npm run minified-new && npm run minified-old
scripts.minified-new: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -t uglifyify dist/index.js --standalone angka > build/index.min.js
scripts.minified-old: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -t uglifyify dist/index.js --standalone angka > index.min.js
scripts.build: tsc && npm run test && npm run minified

author: Gratcy Palma P Hutapea
